text: Cho Min-ho (, 4 January 1987 â€“ 15 June 2022) was a South Korean professional ice hockey center. He played for Anyang Halla. Cho was born in Seoul, South Korea. He also played for the South Korea men's national ice hockey team. His career began in 2009 and he stopped playing in 2021. Cho died from lung cancer in Seoul on 15 June 2022 at the age of 35. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ice hockey players Category:Sportspeople from Seoul Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in South Korea
title: Cho Min-ho
